item.title: Programming - Visual Novel Game
item.description: So I have an idea for a pretty cool Visual Novel Game but in order to make it I need to get better with C# and Unity so first I am programming a simple Dungeon Scroller, rogue-like game using some free assets. You can check out the development and how it’s going at my Github, https://github.com/leoleader
